Texts.Chs: 这一组里面有着各种各样的任务，从基本的生存任务到更复杂的事情，比如教会贵宾犬飞行，或者法国大革命。
Texts.Eng: A wide variety of quests fill this group, from basic survival to more complex things such as teaching poodles to fly, or the French Revolution.

Texts.Chs: 建造属于你自己的飞船
去各种地方有助于完成此分组中的任务。 如果旅行是你的目标，那么你选择这个没有问题。
Texts.Eng: Going places will lead to the completion of tasks in this grouping. If travel is your aim, you'll have no problems here.

Texts.Chs: 在这里，您可以跟踪可能不适合其他任务组的杂项任务。
Texts.Eng: Here you can track miscellaneous tasks which may not fit into other quest groupings.

Texts.Chs: 通过这一系列任务，你能学习到关于富兰克林的宇宙的基本知识。你将被引导通过每个初始太空站，知道它们的用处，并被告知如何获取基本资源。
Texts.Eng: Learn the basics of Frackin Universe through this series of quests. You'll be guided through each of the initial stations, their use, and informed of basic resource acquisition.

Texts.Chs: 这一组中的任务往往与战斗有关，无论是打怪还是造新武器。
Texts.Eng: Quests in this grouping tend to be related to battle, be it killing monsters or creating new sorts of weaponry.
The basics of manual ship building.

Texts.Chs: 这些任务至关重要。如果完不成它们，没人会认为你和我一样棒。这显然不是你想要看到的。
Texts.Eng: These tasks are of the utmost importance. Without completing them nobody will think you are as awesome as I am. That is clearly not something you would desire.

Texts.Chs: 要建造一个实验室，你有很多事情要做。这些任务将帮助你做到这一点。了解每个太空站的功能，以及它们是如何与你星图中的其他太空站一起使用！
Texts.Eng: To build a lab, you have a great number of things to do. This set of quests will serve to aid you in doing exactly that. Learn the function of each station, how it is used in conjunction with other stations in your arsenal and more!

Texts.Chs:
要选择一个任务，请单击左侧窗口中的任务名称，相关信息就会显示在这里。

任务还带有颜色以表示你目前的进度：: 
^red;red^reset; : 不可用
^yellow;yellow^reset; : 可用
^cyan;cyan^reset; : 进行中
^green;green^reset; : 已完成。

可能会有不同的支线任务，你可以通过按下左边窗口顶部的大图来访问。当你完成它们时，会有更多任务可以接取。
Texts.Eng:
To select a task, click on its name on the left window, and relevant information will be displayed here.

Tasks also come with a color to represent your progress with them: 
^red;red^reset; : unavailable
^yellow;yellow^reset; : available
^cyan;cyan^reset; : in progress
^green;green^reset; : complete.

There may be different task branches, which you can access by pressing the big image at the top of the window on the left. More become available as you unlock them.
